text: Spring arrives at CCSF with a warmth I haven't felt in a long time.

The air carries something weightless, clinging to the skin, like the traces of a forgotten dream. The kind of day that reminds the heart it was made for longing, whether real or imagined, love finds its way.
Batmale Hall stands ahead, its doors as unassuming as ever. I'm visiting the ACRC today, for the free printing available to students, nothing particularly more.
I enter the lobby and turn into the staircase. What a weird building.. Third floor disguised as the First floor… This feels like a Batman's secret hideout.
There's a CS Tutor Squad hours posted near its entrance. Most students are hunched over their own laptops, ignoring the ancient desktops lining the walls.
Such focus and determination….. The power level of these brain cells must be over 9000
I walk towards the printer-shaped machine as soon as I spot it and open up my laptop to find the PDF I am trying to print.

I'm here to print out an essay for my English 1B class. I click one more button before the beast clunks to life. A few more seconds, and… a few hot and fresh pages slide out. It smells like baked bread.
The rhythmic shuffle of the printer snaps me back. I slide the pages into a folder, tuck them into my bag, and sling it over my shoulder. I hope I'm not late to class today…
I take in the room. I notice the clutter, or maximalism. At the center, an older gentleman in a red vest sits behind an ellipse shaped table, his quiet authority.
A pool of shonen jump magazines, stickers and trinkets displayed on his desk and I tiptoe closer for a better look.
His desk faces another room. I peer in, only a whiteboard with faded words and scribbles 'General Meeting 2/21' but I don't get the chance to inspect it before--
RRRRRRRRRRRRRR
The sound scrapes against my nerves and I turn towards the saiyan-level screaming coming from the printer.
Tall, frozen mid-motion. Horns curled like a helix in space. His expression is one of pure shock, like he's been caught red-handed. A deer– no, a ram–in headlights.
Rocky stands at the printer, stiff as a board, as if sheer willpower might erase the sound that just tore through the room. His hands hover uselessly over the machine, shoulders tense.
I hesitate. He's clearly embarrassed. His aura -9000. Not even the gacha gods can save him now. Do I step in ?
I step closer, peeking over his shoulder at the printer screen. He still hasn't said a word—maybe he's too stunned to speak.
The screen loads slowly, and when the details appear, I gasp.
Rocky jolts at the sound. He glances at me, wide-eyed and nervous.
Immediately noticing his diabolical mistake. I sigh… Should I tell him what's wrong?
Rubbing the back of my neck. 'Sooo, the problem is... that you're trying to print a thousand pages???'

speaker: Rocky
text: ...Yeah?
I stare at him. He stares back.
It takes me a second to process how utterly unfazed he is. Like he genuinely expected the printer to handle a mountain of color pages without a hitch.
The printer, of course, disagrees. It lets out a weak, defeated beep.
Rocky looks at it like he's just been personally betrayed.
He has a red paper in his hand, kind of crumpled up now. Rocky hands it to me and quickly runs out the room. Bros embarrassed.
I glance at the older gentleman in the red vest—his domain, his problem.
Settling into a seat nearby, I grab one of the Shonen Jump magazines and start flipping through. A few pages in, my eyes flick up, catching glimpses of the disaster unfolding.
The older gentleman leans over, inspecting the printer. Rocky, still standing there, shifts awkwardly from foot to foot.
A quiet exchange happens, and then—Rocky physically recoils. Probably just now realizing the gravity of his thousand-page crime.
I stifle a grin and turn the page.
Rocky turns defeated and quickly exits the room. He leaves a crumpled red flyer on the printer.
It's bright and red. A club fair flyer? 'Unity Day'... I keep reading… Today!?
It piques my interest actually… and free food. It's at Ram Plaza, by the Student Union building. It'll be open for a couple of hours. Perfect timing, since I'll be hungry once I'm let out of class.
Rocky has already left. I wonder if I'll see him again?
...NOO im late for class again.
It's 11:59 am. Only a minute before class ends. My tummy grumbles. I haven't eaten all day.. I take out the flyer. I'll go check it out. If anything, I'll stop by McDonalds.
I sprint Cloud Circle towards Ram Plaza, the bass from the speakers banging in my chest. Red tents line the plaza perimeter, students weaving through the crowd, voices overlapping with the music.
Students crowd the bright, big ASCO tent. It's probably where I should check in. I make my way over, and see Vaughn, ICC Vice President. He has on his usual fashionable jewelry and jorts.
We make eye contact and he hands me a card.

speaker: Vaughn
text: Here's a grid of all the clubs present today on that stamp card. Every club and resource center should have you stamp it after you visit. Five stamps and this Los Kuyas is yours.
He holds up a taco bowl and waves it coyly. My stomach grumbles.
I scan the list. Two clubs stand out.
CS Club, Anime Club
I would like to check out the CS Club, could you point me to them?
Vaughn smiles, knowingly and amused, he must have a soft spot for them. He points towards the Student Union Building.
I make my over and see it. Two tables under another red tent, a huge monitor and three seemingly contrasting characters wait for me.
I make eye contact with one of them.

speaker: Vena
text: Welcome ! Welcome! Are you mayhaps interested in Computer Science-ing?”
Her greeting startles me a bit, like someone turning on the lights in a dark room. Her eyes brighten.

speaker: Vena
text: Before I answer what we do, I must insist on introducing who we are.”

speaker: Vena
text: I'm Vena. I'm the President of this club and we would love to have you. This is my third semester here as a CE major. I love synths, dsp, C++, femb–”
I'm startled. This one is a yapper. Vena doesn't stop herself from disclosing more. My mind is wandering. But my eyes meet the person dressed in pink lolita.

speaker: Pink
text: V-Vena clearly this person is waiting for a stamp, not to hear you yap
She pulls out an ink stick and motions for my card. I hand it over so I'm a fifth way to my free meal. Vena is unfazed and goes on to introduce everyone at the table”

speaker: Vena
text: You're such a hater, Pink. This is my friend, even if she doesn't think so… She's super into pure maths and held coding workshops the past semester. She also decided to dress super cute today as part of the anime club.
Vena motions to the table beside them. Oh, Manga and Anime Club is right next door.
I make eye contact with a blue creature, but not long enough to decide if it's cute or cursed.
I turn back. And contemplate for a moment,
Oh yeah, that is so impressive and I think you look great
Pink is still for a moment, before motioning a thank you and darting behind the tables where I could barely see.

speaker: Pink
text: It's time to sin 🙏
I'm confused, but before I could reason, someone in a zip up hoodie takes her place.

speaker: Jacky
text: Hi I'm Kevin

speaker: Vena
text: HE IS NOT! This is Jacky!

speaker: Jacky
text: NO I'm Kevin!

speaker: Vena
text: This is Jacky, our Olympian level marathon runner. He is also super smart and is doing Data Science-y stuff at UPenn. At the club, he goes to hackathons, wins prizes, and raids tech HQs of all their Yerba Mates.”
Wait, so, you don't go here?
Kev-no, Jacky turtles into his hoodie. I'm guessing the tech HQ raids are where all the company stickers scattered on the table are from.
Hmm, wow you guys do a lot! But where do you guys meet and where are your other officers, Vena?

speaker: Vena
text: We have our general meetings every Friday, 2:30 to 5:00 pm in Batmale 301, the ACRC!
I recognize the name. And think back to the dark computer room in the ACRC.
Ah.

speaker: Vena
text: Well, officially, there are two other officers, but we don't do the top-do system at CS Club. With that being said, they're here today but are still engrossed in their own things right now.

speaker: Vena
text: Gev's busy making a game with Anime Club and John's cooking up his hedge fund in Minecraft… Both haven't showered in a week
This is the first time seeing Vena defeated, but she quickly laughs it off. I realize there is a signup sheet on their table and I pick up an already uncapped pen.
[Enter your name]”
Vena leans over to read it upside down,

speaker: Vena
text: reversed(name)?
No, No- {name}

speaker: Vena
text: Ohhh {name} !Thank you so much for stopping by, pleeease join our Discord where more fun shit happens.

speaker: Vena
text: And also our club advisor is the one and only Jonathon Potter! :) He's the department chair and teaches Assemly in CS 270! He is --
Omg Vena wont stop talking.. I have no idea who Potter is. Maybe I should since I am interested in CS.
I take out my phone to look him up....
From the distance I hear a loud welcoming voice. As a picture of Prof Potter loads in.

speaker: Moof
text: Chat, I love assembly. You should totally take assembly with us.
Oooh thats Jonathan Potter?? I try to remember where I recognize him, but it feels like its locked into the eternal abyss. Not even batman can beat the memory out of me.

speaker: Y/N
text: I would like to check out the Anime Club, could you point me to them?
Vaughn is surprised, but smiles. He points towards the Student Union Building.
I walk over and see it. A table beside a huge red tent. On the table sits a blue creature… who peers into my soul???
Before I realize it, cosplayers swarm me. Are they the club members?
One appears as Tanjiro from Demon Slayer and one dressed as Rin from the Fate/Stay series.
Oh, the CS Club is right next door, I make eye contact with a person in Pink lolita fashion who looks like she belongs to the table in front of me instead.

speaker: Pink
text: Moids are the downfall of humanity. I hate people. Ugh, yuck. People. I wanna go home.

speaker: Freddie
text: Hey come join us. We are anime and manga club!
I sense overwhelming power from this club as I stood there trembling at the hidden aura stored within them similar to the students in the ACRC.

speaker: Michelle
text: Hi new person. Welcome. please introduce yourself and your favorite animes
I find myself unable to leave. Have I been trapped by their domain expansion or is it my domain expansion that has trapped them??
Oooh uhh im uhh Y/N. I like leveling solo. I mean solo leveling, the reincarnated in another world trend, and I play a lot of anime gacha games.

speaker: Citrine
text: Are you another genshin enjoyer?
What tremendous ki. How was I not able to detect this? Standing before me… holding a cute bright blue plushie as if she was there the entire time. Who can this possibly be—.

speaker: Michelle
text: Citriiiiinnnne

speaker: Citrine
text: Helloooo

speaker: Pink
text: Fucking weebs. I think I'm gonna throw up. Fuck this shit.
Omg the language thats only recognized by the greatest of gods.. This is stronger than one punch man in his prime. Do I even belong at this level?

speaker: Freddie
text: Hey come check out our game. It's a Visual Novel we made in collab with CS Club!

speaker: Pink
text: This is diabolical
I click to start the game…. This feels awfully familiar.. The ACRC.. The printer...Uggh im getting dizzy
Maybe I'm just seeing things.... They are deep in some hear me out cake discussion… Nows my chance to secretly walk away---

speaker: Vena
text: Welcome ! Welcome! Are you mayhaps interested in Computer Science-ing?”
Vena introduces herself and somehow the eternal yapping defied all laws of time.....
....----And also our club advisor is the one and only Jonathon Potter! :) He's the department chair and teaches Assemly in CS 270! He is --...
Omg Vena wont stop talking.. I have no idea who Potter is. Maybe I should figure out who this is since I am interested in CS.
I take out my phone to look him up....
From the distance I hear a loud welcoming voice. As a picture of Prof Potter loads in.

speaker: Moof
text: Meowmeowmeowmeowmeow meowmeowmeowmeow meowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeow meowmeowmeowmeow

speaker: Moof
text: Chat, I love assembly. You should totally take assembly with us.
Oooh thats Jonathan Potter?? I try to remember where I recognize him, but it feels like its locked into the eternal abyss. Not even batman can beat the memory out of me.
Some time goes by..
After meeting that interesting bunch of characters. I should probably check out the other tables and resource centers.
Phew~~ I felt like I just encountered the Ginyu force at their full power. I hope I still got some senzu beans.
